You are here:

SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
EINSTEIN PERSONALIZATION
What the Einstein Personalization Data Kit Installs

Use the Einstein Personalization data kit to set up Data Cloud for use with Einstein Personalization. However, the data kit doesn’t install everything necessary to set up Data Cloud to work with Einstein Personalization.

Data Kit Contents
REQUIREMENT	INSTALLED	NOT INSTALLED
Data model objects	
Personalization Point DMO
Personalization Decision DMO
Personalization Schema DMO
Personalizer DMO
Personalization Log DMO
	
Personalization Point View Attribution DMO
Personalization Content View Attribution DMO
Personalization Point Click Attribution DMO
Personalization Content Click Attribution DMO

Connectors and data streams	
A Salesforce CRM data stream is created for these DMOs:
Personalization Point DMO
Personalization Decision DMO
Personalization Schema DMO
Personalizer DMO
The ingestion API connector and data stream for the Personalization Log DMO (including the Ingestion API schema file)
	Salesforce CRM data streams aren’t created for the attribution DMOs. You must create them manually.
Object mapping	

These DMOs are fully mapped during data stream creation:

Personalization Log DMO
Personalization Point DMO
Personalization Decision DMO
Personalization Schema DMO
Personalizer DMO
	

These DMOs require manual mapping:

Personalization Point View Attribution DMO
Personalization Content View Attribution DMO
Personalization Point Click Attribution DMO
Personalization Content Click Attribution DMO

Calculated insights	
Daily Personalization Uniques
Daily Personalization Requests
	Other calculated insights aren’t installed from the data kit. However, you can install the sample calculated insights provided, using SQL. See Examples of Calculated Insights for details.
SEE ALSO
Install the Einstein Personalization Data Kit from AppExchange
Install the Einstein Personalization Ingestion API Data Stream
Install Einstein Personalization Salesforce CRM Data Streams

title: Setting Up Data Cloud for Einstein Personalization
